entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Akulivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:23 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -31.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Akulivik Airport 11:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -31.4°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Humidity: 68 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 29. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 29. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
